(To save time I'm just going to assume Epyon follows with no probs, if you 
don't like that just say so)

Otyebis Staff:


While the medics continued repairing Bruiser, the soldiers led Epyon out of 
the arena, which all the spectators had deserted to go watch other shows 
continuing.  Exiting the only entryway of the arena there were several halls, 
but the soldiers led Epyon through the darkest one, most of their rifles 
still trained on him as if he were a criminal.

They come to a wide, dark area branching off into three tunnels.  "One heads 
to the repair bay, one to a place where you can 'sleep', and one where you 
can recharge by consuming whatever you consume."  The soldiers headed back 
the way they came.
